# Introduction {.unnumbered}

Welcome to the online book for the Lord of the Rings (LotR) R Markdown workshop.

Through this workshop, you will be provided with the knowledge and skills that you will be able to:

- Create your own R Markdown documents
- Export your R Markdown documents to a range of other formats (HTML, PDF, and Word)
- Work with:
    - Figures and tables
    - Equations
    - References
    
# Workshop Files {.unnumbered}

For this workshop you will need the following 3 files:

- `lotr.Rmd`
- `lotr_clean.tsv`
- `lotr_ref.bib`
